member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.TileEffect
member.summary: Repeats the specified region of an image.

remarks.p: This effect generates a logically infinite sized image. To create a smaller tiled region, feed its output through the .
This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Tile effect.
